channel.title: FTC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in FTC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: FTC claims Gmail filtering Republican emails threatens “American freedoms”
item.description: FTC chairman revives GOP claims previously rejected by judge and election agency.

item.title: FTC Files Suit Against Reseller for Price-Gouging Concert Tickets, Including for Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission has filed a lawsuit against a ticket resale company, alleging that it used illegal methods to secure tickets and resell them at inflated rates for popular concerts, includ

item.title: Elon Musk’s “thermonuclear” Media Matters lawsuit may be fizzling out
item.description: Judge blocks FTC’s Media Matters probe as a likely First Amendment violation.

item.title: US moves to ban shady subscription auto-renewals after FTC court loss
item.description: Canceling subscriptions should be easy, lawmakers say, reviving FTC fight.

item.title: Court rules Trump broke US law when he fired Democratic FTC commissioner
item.description: Supreme Court precedent protects FTC commissioner, at least “for the time being.”
